# Mixed Encoding Test File
# Contains both UTF-8 and Latin-1 characters

## UTF-8 Content (Standard)
Hello, World! This is regular ASCII text.
The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

## UTF-8 Special Characters
Cafe with accent: Café
German greetings: Grüß Gott
Euro symbol: €100
Japanese: こんにちは

## Latin-1 Characters (ISO-8859-1)
Copyright: © 2024
Registered: ®
Degrees: 25°C
Fractions: ½, ¼, ¾
Currencies: £, ¥

## Mixed Line
The café serves éclairs for €5.50 each.
Naïve résumé with ümlaut.

## Edge Cases
Empty line above, and text with special dash: –
Curly quotes: “Hello” and ‘World’
Ellipsis: …

End of mixed encoding file.
